skipText:
Hmm...that didnt work. That's alright, you can skip this lesson for now.

Come back again another time to complete it.

parameters.text:
I am going to ask for permission to read your contacts.

Requesting permission...

Try adding a new contact as follows:
1. Tap the button below to launch the Contacts app.
2. Create a new contact, set the "first name" field of the contact to "Simm".
3. Save the new contact.
4. When you are done, invoke the back gesture to come back here.

parameters.TextError:
